level.heading: Secured party not obligated on contract of debtor or in tort.
level.text: The existence of a security interest, agricultural lien, or authority given to a debtor to dispose of or use collateral, without more, does not subject a secured party to liability in contract or tort for the debtor's acts or omissions.
